description: This file defines utility functions for extracting and formatting version information from a given dictionary object, supporting version data as a list or string, with default fallback values.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts a version list [major, minor, patch] from a given info dictionary, supporting version as a list or string, with defaults if not present.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Constructs a version string in the format 'major.minor.patch' from the info dictionary using GetVersion.
